verses.text: O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, why hast thou cast \add us\add* \w off|strong="H2186"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*? \add why\add* doth thine \w anger|strong="H0639"\w* \w smoke|strong="H6225"\w* against the \w sheep|strong="H6629"\w* of thy \w pasture|strong="H4830"\w*?\f + \fr 74.1 \ft Maschil…: or, A Psalm for Asaph to give instruction\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* thy \w congregation|strong="H5712"\w*, \add which\add* thou hast \w purchased|strong="H7069"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*; the \w rod|strong="H7626"\w* of thine \w inheritance|strong="H5159"\w*, \add which\add* thou hast \w redeemed|strong="H1350"\w*; this \w mount|strong="H2022"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w*, wherein thou hast \w dwelt|strong="H7931"\w*.\f + \fr 74.2 \ft rod: or, tribe\f*

Lift \w up|strong="H7311"\w* thy \w feet|strong="H6471"\w* unto the \w perpetual|strong="H5331"\w* \w desolations|strong="H4876"\w*; \add even\add* all \add that\add* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* hath done \w wickedly|strong="H7489"\w* in the \w sanctuary|strong="H6944"\w*.

Thine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w* \w roar|strong="H7580"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of thy \w congregations|strong="H4150"\w*; they set \w up|strong="H7760"\w* their \w ensigns|strong="H0226"\w* \add for\add* \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*.
\add A man\add* was \w famous|strong="H3045"\w* according as he had lifted \w up|strong="H0935"\w* \w axes|strong="H7134"\w* upon the \w thick|strong="H5442"\w* \w trees|strong="H6086"\w*.
But now they break \w down|strong="H1986"\w* the carved \w work|strong="H6603"\w* thereof at \w once|strong="H3162"\w* with \w axes|strong="H3781"\w* and \w hammers|strong="H3597"\w*.

They have \w cast|strong="H7971"\w* \w fire|strong="H0784"\w* into thy \w sanctuary|strong="H4720"\w*, they have \w defiled|strong="H2490"\w* \add by casting down\add* the dwelling \w place|strong="H4908"\w* of thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* to the \w ground|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 74.7 \ft They have cast…: Heb. They have sent thy sanctuary unto the fire\f*

They \w said|strong="H0559"\w* in their \w hearts|strong="H3820"\w*, Let us \w destroy|strong="H3238"\w* them \w together|strong="H3162"\w*: they have burned \w up|strong="H8313"\w* all the \w synagogues|strong="H4150"\w* of \w God|strong="H0410"\w* in the \w land|strong="H0776"\w*.\f + \fr 74.8 \ft destroy: Heb. break\f*

We \w see|strong="H7200"\w* not our \w signs|strong="H0226"\w*: \add there is\add* no more any \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*: neither \add is there\add* among us any that \w knoweth|strong="H3045"\w* how \w long|strong="H5704"\w*.

O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, how long shall the \w adversary|strong="H6862"\w* \w reproach|strong="H2778"\w*? shall the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* \w blaspheme|strong="H5006"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*?

Why \w withdrawest|strong="H7725"\w* thou thy \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, even thy right \w hand|strong="H3225"\w*? \w pluck|strong="H3615"\w* \add it\add* out \w of|strong="H7130"\w* thy \w bosom|strong="H2436"\w*.

For \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \add is\add* my \w King|strong="H4428"\w* of \w old|strong="H6924"\w*, \w working|strong="H6466"\w* \w salvation|strong="H3444"\w* in the \w midst|strong="H7130"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*.

Thou didst \w divide|strong="H6565"\w* the \w sea|strong="H3220"\w* by thy \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*: thou \w brakest|strong="H7665"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of the \w dragons|strong="H8577"\w* in the \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*.\f + \fr 74.13 \ft divide: Heb. break\f*\f + \fr 74.13 \ft dragons: or, whales\f*

Thou \w brakest|strong="H7533"\w* the \w heads|strong="H7218"\w* of \w leviathan|strong="H3882"\w* in pieces, \add and\add* \w gavest|strong="H5414"\w* him \add to be\add* \w meat|strong="H3978"\w* to the \w people|strong="H5971"\w* inhabiting the \w wilderness|strong="H6728"\w*.

Thou didst \w cleave|strong="H1234"\w* the \w fountain|strong="H4599"\w* and the \w flood|strong="H5158"\w*: thou driedst \w up|strong="H3001"\w* \w mighty|strong="H0386"\w* \w rivers|strong="H5104"\w*.\f + \fr 74.15 \ft mighty…: Heb. rivers of strength\f*

The \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \add is\add* thine, the \w night|strong="H3915"\w* also \add is\add* thine: thou hast \w prepared|strong="H3559"\w* the \w light|strong="H3974"\w* and the \w sun|strong="H8121"\w*.

Thou hast \w set|strong="H5324"\w* all the \w borders|strong="H1367"\w* of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w*: thou hast \w made|strong="H3335"\w* \w summer|strong="H7019"\w* and \w winter|strong="H2779"\w*.\f + \fr 74.17 \ft made: Heb. made them\f*

\w Remember|strong="H2142"\w* this, \add that\add* the \w enemy|strong="H0341"\w* hath \w reproached|strong="H2778"\w*, O \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*, and \add that\add* the \w foolish|strong="H5036"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* have \w blasphemed|strong="H5006"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

O \w deliver|strong="H5414"\w* not the \w soul|strong="H5315"\w* of thy \w turtledove|strong="H8449"\w* unto the \w multitude|strong="H2416"\w* \add of the wicked:\add* \w forget|strong="H7911"\w* not the \w congregation|strong="H2416"\w* of thy \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* for \w ever|strong="H5331"\w*.

Have \w respect|strong="H5027"\w* unto the \w covenant|strong="H1285"\w*: for the \w dark|strong="H4285"\w* places of the \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* are \w full|strong="H4390"\w* of the \w habitations|strong="H4999"\w* of \w cruelty|strong="H2555"\w*.

O let not the \w oppressed|strong="H1790"\w* \w return|strong="H7725"\w* \w ashamed|strong="H3637"\w*: let the \w poor|strong="H6041"\w* and \w needy|strong="H0034"\w* \w praise|strong="H1984"\w* thy \w name|strong="H8034"\w*.

\w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, O \w God|strong="H0430"\w*, \w plead|strong="H7378"\w* thine own \w cause|strong="H7379"\w*: \w remember|strong="H2142"\w* how the foolish \w man|strong="H5036"\w* \w reproacheth|strong="H2781"\w* thee \w daily|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w Forget|strong="H7911"\w* not the \w voice|strong="H6963"\w* of thine \w enemies|strong="H6887"\w*: the \w tumult|strong="H7588"\w* of those that rise \w up|strong="H6965"\w* against thee \w increaseth|strong="H5927"\w* \w continually|strong="H8548"\w*.\f + \fr 74.23 \ft increaseth: Heb. ascendeth\f*
